meanings.definition: A woman who cleans floors and surfaces by scrubbing.
meanings.sent1: The scrubwoman diligently scrubbed the kitchen floor until it sparkled.
meanings.sent2: The hospital hired a scrubwoman to keep the corridors clean and hygienic.
meanings.sent3: The scrubwoman accidentally scrubbed away a secret message hidden on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to scrub every inch made her the best scrubwoman in town.
meanings.sent5: The scrubwoman's hands were rough from constant scrubbing.

meanings.definition: A woman who performs menial cleaning tasks.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the scrubwoman arrived early to start her cleaning duties.
meanings.sent2: The office building employed a scrubwoman to ensure everything was spotless.
meanings.sent3: The scrubwoman joked that she was the queen of scrubbing in the cleaning crew.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a scrubwoman, tirelessly cleaning up after everyone else.
meanings.sent5: The scrubwoman's hard work often went unnoticed by others.
